name: MCP GitHub Popular Repo Discovery Tool
alternateName: MCP GitHub 热门 Repo 发现工具
description: A command-line tool to search, collect, and analyze popular and relevant GitHub repositories based on keywords, sorting rules, and filtering conditions. Designed for developers, researchers, and product managers to efficiently discover and evaluate open-source projects.
abstract: Efficiently discover and analyze popular GitHub repositories for Minecraft (MCP) and other projects. This tool helps users save time, improve discovery quality, and simplify the process of finding relevant codebases.
keywords: GitHub, repository, search, discovery, mcp, minecraft, developer tool, cli, python, open source, code analysis, popular repositories
